name: Faircroft's Antiques: The Mountaineer's Legacy
description: Mia Faircroft embarks on a new Hidden Object adventure! A new job sumnons her to Mont Cache, a tranquil skiing haven in the mountains. But the town has changed since the passing of a famous resident, and the residents will need all the help they can get! Mia's grandmother Alice also arrives with a surprising companion in tow! Explore beautiful hidden object scenes, repair antiques, and restore a town's beauty in Faircroft's Antiques: The Mountaineer's Legacy!
